readable.title: 3457460673_800d7f7dd9
readable.content: A little girl swings while her hair flies in the wind . A little girl with red hair and a teal tracksuit on a swing . A redheaded girl with a turquoise jacket is swinging . A young girl wearing a blue sweatshirt smiles as her hair is up in the air . The young girl is swinging on a swing , and her hair is flying out behind her .
